page.title: 18Typical Day _Millbrook Pupil
page.content: My alarm clock goes off at 6am. My hand reaches up & switches it off. I fall asleep. At 7am my brother starts yelling. When I've had my breakfast I watch, "TV AM" then at 8am I get ready for school. At 8.20am my friend calls for me. We arrive at 8.55am. When the bell goes its chaos. Its worse than a London traffic jam. First we have assembly where the Headmaster tells us about all sorts of subjects, usually birds. Then we have maths. We have a break and then English. After this its lunch time. At l.20pm its finished. Some of the things we do like drawing, I like, but things like drawing graphs are boring. We have another break & then, hooray, its hometime. I get home at 4.10pm and I ride my bike, do homework and watch TV.
